metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16393 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Several buffer overflows when handling responses from a Gemsafe V1Smartcard in gemsafe_get_cert_len in libopensc/pkcs15-gemsafeV1.c in OpenSCbefore 0.19.0-rc1 could be used by attackers able to supply craftedsmartcards to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possiblyhave unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: opensc package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
